forum.content:
沒有帥臉，沒有身材，只好分享大叔世代的經典歌曲……
Amanda - performed by Boston

這首歌我在16，7歲乍聽時，並不特別喜歡，只知道是Billboard Top1, 當時英文很差，只是聽旋律…

沒想到自己年過35後，再去回味它時，卻是越聽越有味道~~淺顯易懂的歌詞，卻是感人至深

10年前有幸造訪這個搖滾樂團的發跡地Boston, 作客美國同事家中，飯後啜著啤酒，聽著這首歌時，卻被美國同事告知，主唱Brad Delp已經於2004年自殺身亡……

特別推薦副歌：
You and I
I know that we can't wait
And I swear, I swear it's not a lie, girl.
Tomorrow may be too late
You, you and I, girl
We can share a life together
It's now or never
And tomorrow may be too late
……
關版前，please let her/him know how you feel. It's never too late.

urls.description: Boston - Amanda Check out Boston's website: http://www.bandboston.com/ All music belongs to it's res
urls.title: Boston - Amanda

forum.title: 大叔版的last post
